title: Multiple laundry facilities on site! No need to wait for a wash!
neighborhood: 20 Minute Drive to the Ferns of the World Garden
posting_body: ['Woods at Southlake Apartment Homes', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '850 Mount Zion Rd', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'show contact info', 'The Woods at Southlake is just what you are looking for!', 'Choose a two- or three-bedroom apartment in our beautiful community.', 'We offer excellent amenities, including private patios and balconies, an on-site laundry facility, a playground, and more - we are also just minutes from Southlake Mall and excellent shopping on Mt. Zion Road.', 'Come and discover why our residents love calling The Woods at Southlake Apartments "home."', 'Bedrooms: 2 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 960 - 1000 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1204 - $1403/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance On-Site Service', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '● Park-Like Setting', '● Sparkling Swimming Pool', '● Sundeck', '● Well Equipped Playground', '● Convenient Online Rental Payments/Resident Referral Program', '● Directly On MARTA Bus Line', '● Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '● Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping On Mt. Zion Road', '● Monthly Pest Control', '● Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '● Within Walking Distance to Schools', 'This Unit Comes With:', '● Bright White Kitchen Cabinets', '● Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Electric Range', '● Tub/Shower', '● Wall to Wall Carpeting', '● Frost-Free Refrigerator', '● Instant Hot Water', '● Large Walk-In Closet in Select Units', '● Mini Blinds & Verticals', '● Modern Kitchen with Breakfast Bar', '● Patios/Balconies', '● Very Spacious Floor Plans', '● Vinyl Flooring', '● Washer/Dryer Hookup in Select Units', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Lease-Length: 6-Month, 12-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AEBE084E765C447']
